channel.title: Content Releases
channel.description: Let the world know about your Unreal Engine 4 game project or Unreal Tournament mod, map, mutator, etc!

item.title: Q3 remakes for UT2003/UT2004 (latest links)
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded:
Since I was downloading the Q3 remake maps for UT/UT2003/UT2004 and UT3 anyway, I thought I'd post the updated links I found for UT2003/UT2004 in here (if a map is not listed, then I couldn't find any versions of it for UT2003 or UT2004):

Q3DM1 - Arena Gate
DM-2H-ArenaGateBeta (UT2004) > http://uz2.pwc-networks.com/decompress.php?file=DM-2H-ArenaGateBeta.ut2.uz2
DM-Q3DM1 (UT2004) > http://uz2.pwc-networks.com/decompress.php?file=DM-Q3DM1.ut2.uz2...

Q3 remakes for UT2003/UT2004 (latest links)

item.title: Postal 2 NicksCoop (CO-OP mod)
item.author: invalid@example.com (EvilT-ModZ)
item.dc:creator: EvilT-ModZ
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, want to present my modification for game Postal 2 Complete: Nicks Coop
This is cooperative modification, which allows to play with friends in single-player story mode (standart week + apocalypse weekend).

-fully compatible playthrought
-all single-player features replicated for client players
-fully working level transitions
-custom save/load system
-coop player indicator and teleport systems
-browser...​

Postal 2 NicksCoop (CO-OP mod)

item.title: Beta PulseGun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gizzy)
item.dc:creator: Gizzy
item.content:encoded:
*Taken from my post at OU*

This is the Unreal Tournament beta Pulsegun, or "The Liandri Mark I Pulse Blaster" as it was known as during the beta phase of Unreal Tournament. As the title suggests, this is ONLY for Unreal Tournament. I am currently building the Unreal version and I might release it over the weekend.

The Liandri Mark I Pulse Blaster features include:

* Different Texture
* Feature where the weapon reloads after 50 ammo is used
* Slightly different alternate fire...

Beta PulseGun

item.title: [Mutator/ServerActor] Smarter Bots
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wormbo)
item.dc:creator: Wormbo
item.content:encoded:
Tired of having to choose between dumb and slow bots and aimbot-wielding maniacs when not enough human opponents are around?

"Smarter Bots" applies small modifications to the generic bot AI that removes or reduces the influence of difficulty level on bot skills. Their aim is unaffected, so if godlike aiming scares you, you can scale their accuracy using the difficulty levels as usual. However, many other aspects, such as movement speeds, translocator usage or general jumping and dodging on...

[Mutator/ServerActor] Smarter Bots

item.title: DM-UTCRAFT
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jefe)
item.dc:creator: Jefe
item.content:encoded:
DM-UTCRAFT (v1.0)



A Minecraft village, set on a small island at sunset! It's great for invasion and has a lot of hiding places and secret passages. I strived to make it looks as accurate to Minecraft as possible (with a few intentional exceptions) while also making it play well in UT2004. I hope you enjoy this map!

This map includes a music mutator that picks a random Minecraft song (thank you, Great Emerald!) when the map loads. It works...

DM-UTCRAFT

item.title: UT2004 Vampire Invasion mutator for Invasion & Vehicle Invasion
item.author: invalid@example.com (ddraigcymraeg)
item.dc:creator: ddraigcymraeg
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
Decided to play some UT2004 over the holidays and ended up creating a small mutator that alters both regular Invasion and the Vehicle Invasion mod, that others may enjoy.
Title: Vampire Invasion Mutator for Invasion & Vehicle Invasion
Version: 1.2 (1.2 fixes scoreboard for multiplayer clients)
Description: A small mutator for UT2004 which optionally awards players health for monster kills, and optionally allows for players to respawn right after death to keep...

UT2004 Vampire Invasion mutator for Invasion & Vehicle Invasion

item.title: DM-PainStation
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jival34)
item.dc:creator: Jival34
item.content:encoded:
Hi folks

Here is my first playable UT2k4 map, inspired by 'C3L1_Train_Station' level from Painkiller.
Several months have passed since the foundation stone was laid, with long pauses and working days in between building sessions.

Some 'MyLevel' resources are from mods (see the ReadMe included in archive), websites and other games using the Unreal Engine 2.5, but most of these are my own creations with Audacity, Photoshop 7.0, and UnrealEd 3.0.
All custom static-meshes were made with BSP...

DM-PainStation

item.title: Jetpack for UT2k4 [DL][Pic][30 Aug 2013]
item.author: invalid@example.com (meowcat)
item.dc:creator: meowcat
item.content:encoded:
Jetpack for UT2k4 [DL][Pic][22 Sept 2013]

Title: YM Jetpack
Description: Jetpacks for UT2k4 that mimic the behavior of the jetpack from Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire. Two versions: "Old Skool" Low Poly (ala SW:SOTE) and newer model (made to look like the one from Halo:Reach)
Version: Rev-2, 22 September 2013 for UT2k4
Author: Meowcat (models, skins, physics code).

Download...

Jetpack for UT2k4 [DL][Pic][30 Aug 2013]

item.title: Occupant17 Mod pre-alpha Video
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi all, apart from no time to sit and map I am still working on the Occupant17 Mod.

I have released a pre-alpha 'look' at what we are doing so far.

The Weapons aren't finished and the NPC's are in 'easy' mode for now but you'll get an idea of how the levels' work.

The Mine Layer is staying but I need to re-texture most of the standard weapons, Ballistic Weapons and Zweapons Mods are used, Bshotgun texture is a test-texture.

This is Level14 - Tunnels pre-alpha :...

Occupant17 Mod pre-alpha Video

item.title: Christmas Decoration [Mutator/ServerActor]
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wormbo)
item.dc:creator: Wormbo
item.content:encoded:
This mutator or server actor adds proper holiday decoration to many maps. These decorations are not map-specific, but are applied to certain objects in the maps. In most cases, decorations are just visual additions, but in some cases they may change the way players interact with the map.

See the included text file for installation/usage instructions. If you use it as mutator on a server, the server will no longer be white-listed. But if you configure it as server actor, your server's...

Christmas Decoration [Mutator/ServerActor]

item.title: Re : Freon V2 + TAM V4 + Team DeathMatch V2
item.author: invalid@example.com (rejecht)
item.dc:creator: rejecht
item.content:encoded:
Re adds reworked versions of the popular game types Team ArenaMaster, Freon, and Team DeathMatch to Unreal Tournament 2004 (v3369).

The reworked versions fix bugs, add optimizations and new features to these game types.

Download Now!
This is the final release and includes the source files.

Project Home Page
https://sites.google.com/site/rejecht/re/

Features

Freon...

Re : Freon V2 + TAM V4 + Team DeathMatch V2

item.title: Fourever Mod (UTF)
item.author: invalid@example.com (MonsOlympus)
item.dc:creator: MonsOlympus
item.content:encoded:
Unreal Tournament Fourever Modification (UTF)

Hello, for those who don't know me I released a series of mutators for UT3 under the package name of Newtators. I have been a part of the UT mod community since UT2003, learning UScript and now working with Blueprint to create gameplay modifications.

This modification is a...

Fourever Mod (UTF)
